translations: n.争吵，拌嘴；抱怨（或不赞成）的理由；<史>（用石弓或劲弩发射的）方镞箭，方头投射物
v.争吵，吵架；不同意，反对；抱怨

phrs.translation: v. 抱怨；不同意；拒绝接受；跟…吵架

sentences.sentence: They had a quarrel about money.
He did not mention the quarrel with his wife.
sentences.translation: 他没有提起和妻子的争吵。

sentences.sentence: My sister and I used to quarrel all the time.
sentences.translation: 我和妹妹过去老是吵架。
